  • java.lang.Object

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DependencyManager.DownloadFuture.DownloadRunnable

    public abstract class SimpleRunnable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Runnable class to ease the management of threads

        public final void disable(boolean clean)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalThreadStateException
        Disables this thread from running
        Parameters:
        clean - Whether to clean the thread running - This will prevent this runnable from being able to run, only cleans if enabled in the config
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalThreadStateException
